File list
---------

// start with this file, it contains a description of the other files
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Introduction and Documentation Guide for Android.pdf

// unzip and open index.html in your browser
API Reference Manual.zip

// main user manuals
OSMP+_User_Guide.pdf
OnStream MediaPlayer+.SDK Project Setup for Android.pdf
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Player SDK Integration Guide for Android.pdf
// source code for manual above
Labs.zip

// application guides
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Download Manager Integration Guide for Android.pdf
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Device Capability File AG.pdf
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Player API Upgrade AG.pdf
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Player API Variances AG for Android and iOS.pdf
OnStream MediaPlayer+.Player SDK Migration AG for Android (V2-V3).pdf
